suncertify.gui.util
Class GUIHelper

java.lang.Object
  suncertify.gui.util.GUIHelper

public final class GUIHelper
extends Object

GUIHelper is a helper class for GUI. Its main responsibility is to read and provide specific data from configuration files to GUI widgets, e.g.:

  • contractor's specialties
  • currency symbols

Author:
Przemyslaw Bielicki
